hero.title: Welcome to Our Company
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner in global import-export operations. We specialize in premium food grains, oil seeds, and agricultural products, connecting markets worldwide with quality and reliability.

about.title: Powerful Strategies for Global Growth
about.description1: We help companies elevate their brands with strategic international campaigns. Our mission is to connect the best of Indian manufacturing to worldwide markets, ensuring every brand reaches its potential.
about.description2: From product packaging to global distribution, we handle it all â€” guided by passion and precision.
about.qualityDesc: Certified quality products meeting international standards
about.trustedDesc: 15+ years of reliable service in global trade

globalReach.title: Global Reach, Local Expertise
globalReach.description1: We proudly offer our import-export services in Canada, USA, UK, Germany, and Australia. With deep market knowledge and a strong logistics network, we ensure timely and safe delivery across continents.
globalReach.description2: Our mission is to deliver the best products at competitive prices. Whether it's bulk trading or niche shipments, we guarantee quality, consistency, and compliance with global standards.
globalReach.description3: Partner with us for smooth documentation, strategic packaging, and seamless international trade operations.

whyChoose.title: Your Success is Our Priority
whyChoose.subtitle: We combine industry expertise, global reach, and unwavering commitment to quality, making us the preferred partner for businesses worldwide.
whyChoose.qualityDesc: Rigorous quality control processes and international certifications ensure premium products every time.
whyChoose.timelyDesc: Efficient logistics network and reliable supply chain management for on-time deliveries worldwide.
whyChoose.networkDesc: Extensive partnerships across 50+ countries with local expertise in international markets.
whyChoose.experienceDesc: 15+ years of proven track record in agricultural commodity trading and export excellence.
whyChoose.supportDesc: Dedicated team of trade experts providing personalized service and comprehensive support.
whyChoose.logisticsDesc: Advanced supply chain solutions and partnerships with leading logistics providers globally.

founders.title: Meet Our Founders
founders.subtitle: Our visionary leaders bring decades of combined experience in international trade, driving innovation and excellence in global commerce.

contact.title: Let's Start Your Global Trade Journey
contact.subtitle: Ready to expand your business globally? Contact our trade experts for personalized solutions and competitive quotes.

aboutPage.title: About Bluenza International
aboutPage.subtitle: Welcome to Bluenza International, where global trade meets excellence. As a premier import-export company, we bridge markets worldwide with innovative solutions and premium products. Our commitment to quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction has established us as a trusted partner in international trade. With expertise in water bottles, accessories, and custom solutions, we deliver value that transcends borders.
aboutPage.missionDesc: To connect global markets through quality products, reliable services, and sustainable practices, enriching lives and economies worldwide.
aboutPage.visionDesc: To be a global leader in import-export services, recognized for our commitment to quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction, touching lives and economies worldwide.

2008.title: Company Founded
2008.desc: Bluenza International LLP was established with a vision to connect global markets through quality agricultural products.

2012.title: International Expansion
2012.desc: Expanded operations to cover 25+ countries across Asia, Europe, and Africa.

2016.title: Quality Certifications
2016.desc: Achieved ISO certification and various international quality standards.

2020.title: Digital Transformation
2020.desc: Implemented advanced technology solutions for better supply chain management.

2024.title: Global Leadership
2024.desc: Now serving 50+ countries with a network of trusted partners worldwide.

values.qualityFirstDesc: We never compromise on quality, ensuring every product meets the highest international standards.
values.customerFocusDesc: Our customers' success is our success. We build long-term partnerships based on trust and reliability.
values.globalPerspectiveDesc: We think globally while acting locally, understanding diverse market needs and cultural nuances.
values.continuousGrowthDesc: We constantly evolve and innovate to stay ahead in the dynamic global trade environment.

missionPoints.point3: Build lasting partnerships across the globe

valuesSection.title: Our Core Values
valuesSection.subtitle: These values guide every decision we make and every relationship we build.

ctaSection.title: Ready to Partner with Us?
ctaSection.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied clients who trust Bluenza International for their global trade needs.

productsPage.title: Products
productsPage.subtitle: Explore our premium range of water bottles and accessories. Quality, durability, and innovation for every hydration need.
productsPage.heroSubtitle: Discover our range of high-quality water bottles designed for every lifestyle and hydration need.

250ml.name: 250ml Water Bottle
250ml.description: Perfect for personal hydration on-the-go. Compact and lightweight design ideal for kids, travel, and quick refreshment needs.

500ml.name: 500ml Water Bottle
500ml.description: Our most popular size, perfect for daily hydration needs. Ideal for office, gym, and outdoor activities with optimal portability.

1L.name: 1L Water Bottle
1L.description: Large capacity bottle for extended hydration needs. Perfect for sports, long journeys, and family use with superior durability.

cta.title: Need Custom Bottles or Bulk Orders?
cta.subtitle: We offer custom branding and bulk orders for businesses. Contact our team to discuss your specific requirements.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: Get in touch with our team for any inquiries, quotes, or support. We're here to help you with all your import-export needs.
contactPage.heroSubtitle: Ready to start your global trade journey? Our experienced team is here to provide personalized solutions and competitive quotes for all your import-export needs.
